main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a circular object floating and moving erratically in Rockingham, N.C. on February 27, 1955.
interesting points: The observer was outside when they first noticed the object approaching them,The object changed in appearance from circular to a floating shape as it moved away,The observation lasted for about 3 minutes,The report was classified under Project Blue Book, and there was no physical evidence or photographs provided.
witness description: The observer was a civilian outdoors observer.
